NAME:
   getenvoy run - Run Envoy and collect process state on exit

USAGE:
   getenvoy run [command options] <reference> -- <envoy-args>

DESCRIPTION:
   The '<reference>' minimally includes the Envoy version.
   The '<envoy-args>' are interpreted by Envoy.
   
   Example:
   $ getenvoy run 1.17.1 -- --config-path ./bootstrap.yaml
   
   To view all available builds, invoke the "list" command.

OPTIONS:
   --help, -h  show help (default: false)
